title: Kinetic Theory - claim about atom speeds

content.question: Which of the following correctly indicates whether the student’s claim is correct or incorrect, and provides a valid justification?

choices.label: Correct, because the average kinetic energy of the gas atoms decreases and the kinetic energy of every gas atom will decrease.
Correct, because the rate of collisions between the gas atoms and the container wall will decrease.
Incorrect, because the average kinetic energy of the gas atoms decreases but any individual atom’s energy may increase or decrease due to random processes.
Incorrect, because the average kinetic energy of the gas atoms will not change because the volume of the container is not changing.

content.answer: Incorrect, because the average kinetic energy of the gas atoms decreases but any individual atom’s energy may increase or decrease due to random processes.
